name: Butter Chicken Chaos
description:
You play as a chef who has accidentally added an experimental ingredient to his signature butter chicken, causing unexpected side effects that turn people into crazy chickens. The goal of the game is to fight off the chickens that are storming your kitchen, collecting the ingredients they drop and add them to the butter chicken in hopes of fixing it.

Play in Full Screen

Use WASD for controlling the character

Use the mouse to point your knife and click attack
